name: Chipis
description: Welcome to the whimsical world of Chipis, where 1000 adorable, chubby miner cats are ready to dig their way into your heart and the blockchain! Each Chipi is a unique, randomly generated bundle of cuteness, donning mining gear and an irresistible charm. These pudgy little prospectors are not just NFTs; they're a playful blend of art and personality, perfect for cat lovers and crypto enthusiasts alike. Dig in and adopt your purrfect Chipi companion!
